001    import javax.swing.JFrame;
002import javax.swing.JTextField;
003import javax.swing.JButton;
004import javax.swing.JTextArea;
005import javax.swing.JLabel;
006import javax.swing.ImageIcon;
007import javax.swing.JScrollPane;
008import javax.swing.JPanel;
009import javax.swing.BoxLayout;
010import java.awt.Dimension;
011import java.awt.BorderLayout;
012import java.awt.GridLayout;
013import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
014import java.awt.event.WindowEvent;
015import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
016import java.awt.event.WindowAdapter;
017import java.net.URL;
018/**
019 * Cette classe est une partie du jeu "Le mÃ©tro abandonnÃ©". 
020 * "Le mÃ©tro abandonnÃ©" est trÃ¨s facile, c'est un jeu basÃ© sur des commandes.   
021 * 
022 * Cette classe permet de traiter tout ce qui est visuel. C'est ce que le joueur voit, c'est l'interface.
023 * 
024 * @author  Maxime BOUET
025 * @version 28.02.2020
026 */
027public class UserInterface implements ActionListener
028{
029    private GameEngine aEngine;
030    private JFrame     aMyFrame;
031    private JTextField aEntryField;
032    private JTextArea  aLog;
033    private JLabel     aImage;
034    private JButton    aButton;
035    private JButton    aButton2;
036    private JButton    aButton3;
037    private JButton    aButton4;
038    private JPanel    aButtonPanel;
039    private JPanel    aButtonLine1;
040    private JPanel    aButtonLine2;
041    private JPanel    aButtonLine3;
042    /**
043     * Constructeur de la classe UserInterface.
044     * Initialise l'attribut aEngine et crÃ©er la fenÃªtre de jeu.
045     */
046    public UserInterface( final GameEngine pGameEngine )
047    {
048        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
049        this.createGUI();
050    } // UserInterface(.)
051
052    /**
053     * Affiche du texte sur la fenÃªtre de texte.
054     */
055    public void print( final String pText )
056    {
057        this.aLog.append( pText );
058        this.aLog.setCaretPosition( this.aLog.getDocument().getLength() );
059    } // print(.)
060
061    /**
062     * Affiche du texte sur la fenÃªtre de texte. Suivi d'un retour Ã  la ligne.
063     */
064    public void println( final String pText )
065    {
066        this.print( pText + "\n" );
067    } // println(.)
068
069    /**
070     * Affiche une image du dossier image sur la fenÃªtre de jeu
071     */
072    public void showImage( final String pImageName )
073    {
074        String vImagePath = "" + pImageName; // to change the directory
075        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource( vImagePath );
076        if ( vImageURL == null )
077            System.out.println( "Image non trouvÃ©e : " + vImagePath );
078        else {
079            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImageURL );
080            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
081            this.aMyFrame.pack();
082        }
083    } // showImage(.)
084
085    /**
086     * procÃ©dure permettant d'activer ou de dÃ©sactiver la saisie dans le champs de saisie.
087     */
088    public void enable( final boolean pOnOff )
089    {
090        this.aEntryField.setEditable( pOnOff ); // enable/disable
091        if ( ! pOnOff ) { // disable
092            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 0 ); // cursor won't blink
093            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener( this ); // won't react to entry
094        }
095    } // enable(.)
096
097    /**
098     * ProcÃ©dure qui configure une interface utilisateur grafique.
099     */
100    private void createGUI()
101    {
102        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame( "MÃ©tro" ); // change the title
103        this.aEntryField = new JTextField( 34 );
104
105        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
106        this.aLog.setEditable( false );
107        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane( this.aLog );
108        vListScroller.setPreferredSize( new Dimension(200, 200) );
109        vListScroller.setMinimumSize( new Dimension(100,100) );
110        
111        this.aButton = new JButton("regarder");
112        this.aButton2 = new JButton("signer");
113        this.aButton3 = new JButton("enleverCarte");
114        this.aButton4 = new JButton("afficherCarte");
115        
116        JPanel vPanel = new JPanel();
117        this.aImage = new JLabel();
118        this.aButtonPanel = new JPanel();
119        this.aButtonPanel.setLayout(new GridLayout(3, 3));
120        
121        this.aButtonPanel.add(this.aButton);
122        this.aButtonPanel.add(this.aButton2);
123        this.aButtonPanel.add(this.aButton3);
124        this.aButtonPanel.add(this.aButton4);
125
126        vPanel.setLayout( new BorderLayout() ); // ==> only five places
127        vPanel.add( this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH );
128        vPanel.add( vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER );
129        vPanel.add( this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.SOUTH );
130        vPanel.add(this.aButtonPanel, BorderLayout.WEST);
131
132        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( vPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER );
133
134        // add some event listeners to some components
135        this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this );
136        this.aButton.addActionListener(this);
137        this.aButton2.addActionListener(this);
138        this.aButton3.addActionListener(this);
139        this.aButton4.addActionListener(this);
140
141        // to end program when window is closed
142        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener( new WindowAdapter() {
143            public void windowClosing(WindowEvent e) { System.exit(0); }
144        } );
145
146        this.aMyFrame.pack();
147        this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true );
148        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
149    } // createGUI()
150
151    /**
152     * ProcÃ©dure qui vÃ©rifie les actions du joueur sur la fenÃªtre de jeu.
153     */
154    public void actionPerformed( final ActionEvent pE ) 
155    {
156        // no need to check the type of action at the moment
157            // because there is only one possible action (text input) :
158        if(pE.getSource() == this.aButton)
159            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("regarder");
160        else if(pE.getSource() == this.aButton2)
161            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("signer");
162        else if(pE.getSource() == this.aButton3)
163            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("enleverCarte");
164        else if(pE.getSource() == this.aButton4)
165            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("afficherCarte");
166        else
167            this.processCommand(); // never suppress this line
168    } // actionPerformed(.)
169
170    /**
171     * ProcÃ©dure qui analyse la commande entrÃ©e et qui la lit pour la traiter
172     */
173    private void processCommand()
174    {
175        String vInput = this.aEntryField.getText();
176        this.aEntryField.setText( "" );
177
178        this.aEngine.interpretCommand( vInput );
179    } // processCommand()
180} // UserInterface
